TestDescription.name: IMAP weak password
TestDescription.Description: The IMAP server is using a weak password. Acunetix WVS was able to guess the credentials required to access this resource. [break]A weak password is short, common, a system default, or something that could be rapidly guessed by executing a brute force attack using a subset of all possible passwords, such as words in the dictionary, proper names, words based on the user name or common variations on these themes.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker may access the contents of the password-protected resource.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Enforce a strong password policy. Don't permit weak passwords or passwords based on dictionary words.
